short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Protect your mental health by removing advertising and newsfeed from LinkedIn.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you need to use LinkedIn as part of your job or for finding work? Do you find the user experience to be distracting, time-wasting, or bad for your mental health? LinkedIn is often deep with political advertising or unrepresentative updates that can be very engaging, but unhealthy over long periods of time. This extension will remove distracting content from LinkedIn to help improve your efficiency and mental health.
